channel.title: [killerscape server development]
channel.description:
Hey wasup this is Killer 99,
I have been working on my server for the past 5 weeks and i've done so much but i think its time i got help, you can go check out what we have done at my website butten.
[Server info] - Based on devolution v7 (way past that) [Server Acheivements] - Null protection fixed trades Assualt Mini Game Configured Shops ALL WORKING SPECAILS ALL WEPON JUST LIKE IN RS!!!! One of the best clients out there ( I WANT A GOD DAMN WEBCLIENT!!! ) Full barrows full Npc attacking emotes + death Dragon Cave Daganoth Cave Monster Tele button Working on God wars atm Full cooking full fishing full slayer full crafting full fletching full mining full smtihing Full theiving full pking full wepon timers full wepon attacks right working d bow working ancients fixed ancients + normal magic i em a very good graphic designer Full characters file backup the best one out there (i will never give it out) ( sprites models backgrounds ) just put it to your head i havent been doing this very long im working on full prayer... [Recruits] Not many actuly just me and my cuzin... [Help needed] Just plain old coders im forming a commuinity so im gunna need alot of ppl =) my computers can go up to about 700 players i have a 7 tarabite space on the counterary of my rich ant =) i have over 60 drives a:/-y:/ aa:/-yy:/ lol ok but any way my internet speed is my mom has here own network in this house =) so its like super speed... so its basicly the best way to start out. [size=20pt]so grab ur friends this is gunna be the funnest journy ever![/size]

Hey wasup this is Killer 99,

I have been working on my server for the past 5 weeks and i’ve done so much but i think its time i got help,
you can go check out what we have done at my website butten.

ok
